text: Unequal treatment based on skin color persists in housing and employment sectors.
Ageism can limit opportunities for older workers, regardless of skill.

Ableism excludes people with disabilities from full participation.

Discrimination in healthcare affects patient outcomes.
Bias in AI algorithms can perpetuate societal inequalities.

Educational disparities rooted in discrimination hinder academic achievement.

Xenophobia and discrimination are based on irrational fears and prejudice.
Systematic bias in algorithms could replicate and reinforce societal prejudices.
Intersectionality highlights how various forms of discrimination can overlap and compound.
Legal protections against discrimination vary by location and jurisdiction.
Discrimination erodes social cohesion and undermines the fabric of society.
The hiring manager dismissed her resume instantly because of her last name.
He overheard a comment about 'those people' getting special treatment.
Store security followed the customer closely throughout the entire store.
The older woman clutched her purse tighter when the teenager walked by.
Their application was denied despite a credit score of over 800.
A group of teens shouted insults at a passing car for not speaking English.
The neighborhood association restricted the type of landscaping allowed.
She wasn't invited to the client dinner because she was the only woman.
The job description requested someone 'energetic' instead of 'experienced'.
He reported feeling unwelcome and passed over for opportunities due to age.
The group mocked their coworker's accent during their coffee break.
A student overheard a teacher making offensive remarks about a learning disability.
They avoided certain areas of the city, associating them with danger and chaos.
The loan application was rejected due to residing in a certain area code.
He felt he had to change his natural hairstyle to fit in at work.
She was passed up for promotion because they assumed she would leave to start a family.
The bus driver refused to pick up passengers in one area due to a rise in attacks.
He said it was a 'joke' but she didn't find the ethnic slur very funny.
They segregated themselves in the cafeteria, only associating with similar people.
The restaurant refused to serve the customers because of the color of their skin.
Differential treatment based on perceived group affiliation occurs across societies.

Stereotypes play a significant role in discriminatory behavior.

Discrimination, in its simplest form, is differential treatment based on group affiliation.
Historically, discriminatory practices have significantly impacted societal structures worldwide.

Data analysis reveals disparities suggesting potential discriminatory practices.
